TextView.android:text: * Is the area fall under dark zone/black zon areas notified by the government from time to time
* Pumping water level in reqired.(In meter)
* Type of the Internet connectivity available in the area
* Is farmer having electric connection of the DISCOM at the site.
* South facing shadow free land available at site for instalation
* Agree to install universal solar pump controller
